name: SHRED2 Prototype
description:
An early prototype of SHRED2

I'd like to receive as much early feedback as possible to make this game the best i can. Any feedback is appreciated.

controlls:

WASD : Movement

SPACE : Jump

1,2,3,4 : Switch weapons (sword,shotgun,rifle,plasmarifle)

Q : Quickswich

H : Change hand position (for the left-handed and oldschool fans out there )
